attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this time of financial difficulties, its about time politicans and ministers gave up their monetary perks for second homes and be grateful they have at least got a home, some people in this country haven't even got a place to call home. At least it would help to stop putting a strain on the monetary purse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
